item.title: Before Bill Skarsgård, 2024's Nosferatu Nearly Cast 3 Famous Actors For Count Orlok (Including A Star Who Already Portrayed Him 24 Years Ago)
item.description: Nosferatu star Bill Skarsgård reveals that before he landed the role of Count Orlok, director Robert Eggers nearly cast three famous actors instead.

item.title: One Of Christopher Nolan's Best Movies Is Finally Coming To Netflix Next Month
item.description: One of Christopher Nolan's most acclaimed films will finally come to Netflix, after recently receiving a series re-release screenings in theaters.

item.title: Superman’s New Green Lantern Guy Gardner Explained
item.description: Nathan Fillion’s Guy Gardner debuts in Superman! Explore his bold Green Lantern persona and future in the DCU!
